divs: Sighting DetailsI woke up and looked out to see an extremly brigt object that appeared to be changing shape and color. As I watched, this object appeared to be moving very slowly higher in the sky. Occasionally I would see a red dot ant to top of the shape which seemed vertically oblong. I got my digital camera, went otside, zoom in and took two 3.5 megapixel photos about a minute apart.When I process the photos on my computer, and blew them up it was appearant that this was some type of UFO. I have saved the originals and am happy to submit them.
Summary: Bright object , moving slowly, larger than a star changing shape and color.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Hope Mills
There were no other sightings in Hope Mills on or around March 15th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
